title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Monetizing agentic AI solutions: A Partner's guide for AI agents & tools-PEX112
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 货币化代理AI解决方案：合作伙伴的AI代理和工具指南-PEX112
abstract: Learn how AWS Partners can unlock new revenue streams by bringing their agentic AI solutions, including agents, tools, and professional services, to market through AWS Marketplace. This session covers how Partner solutions complement the AWS AI stack, best practices for marketplace product positioning, and includes a demonstration of how customers can deploy your AI solutions on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. Gain actionable insights to accelerate monetization of your AI solutions and effectively reach AWS customers through AWS Marketplace.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS合作伙伴如何通过AWS Marketplace将其代理AI解决方案（包括代理、工具和专业服务）推向市场，从而开启新的收入来源。本次会议涵盖合作伙伴解决方案如何补充AWS AI技术栈、市场产品定位最佳实践，并包括客户如何在Amazon Bedrock AgentCore上部署您的AI解决方案的演示。获得可操作的见解，加速您的AI解决方案货币化，并通过AWS Marketplace有效触达AWS客户。
